useCase.name: Victim Confirmation
useCase.description: UAV requests and receives victim confirmation or refutation from a human operator.

preconditions.precondition: The UAV has detected a victim with confidence greater or equal to _minimum_detection_confidence_.

successEndConditions.condition: A human operator correctly confirms or refutes the sighting of the victim.

failureEndConditions.condition: A human operator either fails to respond to the request for confirmation or incorrectly confirms or refutes the sighting of the victim.

useCase.trigger: The UAV detects a possible victim using its onboard image detection.

mainSequence.step: The drone generates a [victim_found] alert which is transmitted to DroneResponse.
DroneResponse acknowledges receipt of the alert via a message to the UAV.
DroneResponse raises the [victim_found] alert on the UI for inspection by a human operator.
The Drone Commander inspects the video stream.
The Drone Commander confirms that a victim has been found.
DroneResponse sends a [victim_found] confirmation message to the UAV.

esteps.description: The user refutes the victim sighting.
esteps.step: The drone commander refutes that the sighting is of a victim.
DroneResponse sends a [victim_NOT_found] message to the UAV.

esteps.description: The user is unable to confirm or refute the sighting.
esteps.step: The drone commander is uncertain whether the imagery is of a victim and requests additional imagery.
The UAV autonomously flies around the location of the victim sighting and collects additional imagery.
The operator either confirms the victim has been found (resume from step 5) or refutes the sighting, in which case the UAV continues its previous search plan.

esteps.description: No acknowledgment is received from the operator within a specified time period.
esteps.step: The UAV attempts to resend the alert and routes the alert and associated images through other participating drones.
